name: Fcorvus
summary: Solve puzzles, uncover riddles, and hunt crows and ravens through layered scenes of mystery. Assemble, search, and compete to reveal the hidden truth in a world where every shadow tells a story. Play solo, with or versus a friend. Learn about the fabulous corvus.

name: F*ck the HELL out
summary: Fuck the Hell Out is a top-down action shooter where you purge the vast cosmos of hellish pests. Crush their skulls, shatter their spirits, and dominate with your arsenal in endless space battles.

name: F*ck Stalin
summary: Avenge millions of innocent victims and inflict brutal violence on the communist dictator Joseph Stalin using a wide range of torture tools thanks to the blessing of the free market.

name: FC Barcelona Club Football
summary:
Club Football is a soccer series designed to re-create the individual team experience. A total of 17 games released in the Club Football series are tailored to the specific European teams on which they are based, including character facial mapping from each of the 22 position players on the roster.

Each game features bespoke content - including media archive clips of great goals and famous victories - and allows fans to add themselves to the 2003/04 starting line-up of their favourite side.

name: F*ck This Game
summary: A difficult arcade game; multitask by controlling 8 minigames at once to reach the highest score you can!

name: FC Barcelona Club Football 2005
summary: The follow-up edition to Codemasters' multi-title soccer franchise (each dedicated to a single team in the UK and continental European football league and featuring unique presentation and other team-specific aspects), the 2005 series is powered by an accelerated game engine and new animation system to deliver faster and more responsive gameplay for precise control on the pitch. With twice the amount of official team content in each game, great skill moves and new game modes including Career, Practice and classic Scenarios (plus new clubs added to the line-up), the new Club Football 2005 range will bring players even closer to the heart of the action and the heart of their team.

name: FC Mobile
summary: EA Sports FC Mobile is here. Build your Ultimate Team from the world's top players, clubs, and leagues. Challenge your friends head-to-head. Play exciting live events based on real-world football to perfect your lineup. Personalise your team in the all new Locker Room. Take part in the new UEFA Champions League Tournament mode and make history. Join us in building the future of football.

name: F*ck This Job
summary: Tired of work? In F*ck This Job, release your pent-up stress! Use office supplies as weapons and face off against colleagues, bosses, and managers. Your goal is simple: escape this hellish company alive!
